metadata.name: HAND OF DESERT
metadata.description:
Different places and different emotions.

According to its author, each visitor can give his own interpretation of the meaning of the sculpture.

Â¿What do you feel when you see this sculpture?

For me it represents CONNECTION with YOURSELF, at some moments HOPE, and also the hand saying GOODBYE or WELCOMING people who arrive in the DESERT.

Sculpture by Mario Irarrazabal in the Atacama Desert.

Freestyle and music by boyka.
